name: Greatogre Raiders
description: The greatest of ogre tribes, who only interact with their lessers when they need something - food, coin, or just a challenge!

great_ogre_leader.name: Great-Ogre Mounted Leader
great_ogre_leader.description: From high atop his mount, this great-ogre leads his tribe

great_ogre_fangriders.name: Great-Ogre Fangriders
great_ogre_fangriders.description: The weakest of the Great-Ogres, they're nevertheless terrifying in a fight.

carnivorous_scavengers.name: Carnivorous Scavengers
carnivorous_scavengers.description: Carnivorous beasts that follow the great-ogres, taking their feasts from the bodies left behind.

ferocious_pets.name: Ferocious Pets
ferocious_pets.description: Pets of the great-ogres, underestimating these wildcats will be your doom

great_leader.name: Leader's Bellowing
great_leader.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Cavalry_ units within 6".  These units re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+

stampede.name: Stampede
stampede.description: Use when a _Cavalry_ unit makes a charge action. The Impact Rule gains +1 AP for the charge.
stampede.flavor: Ogres like to charge with full force into enemy ranks and trampling them beneath their hooves and tusks.

thick_skinned.name: Thick Skinned
thick_skinned.description: Use before taking Save rolls for an Infantry unit. It gets +1 Save.
thick_skinned.flavor: Ogres are said to have layers of hardened skin that are impossible to penetrate.

brutality.name: Brutality
brutality.description: Use before fighting with a _Cavalry_ unit. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.
brutality.flavor: With their superior strength and savagery these beasts can easily crush any opposition.

haste.name: Haste
haste.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may immediately make a free move action.

pain.name: Pain
pain.description: Target enemy model within 12" takes 1 automatic hit with AP(3).

lightning_storm.name: Lightning Storm
lightning_storm.description: Target enemy unit within 12" take 5 hits each with no AP
